result.html: d'fhan muid i mbrúWe stayed in a hostel.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan muid i mbrúWe stayed in a hostel.

result.eng: We stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ga: d'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.orig: d'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosa
result.html: d'fhan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feadh píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan muid inár luí ar an trá ar feaḋ píosaWe stayed lying on the beach for a while.

result.eng: I stayed home the whole day.
result.ga: d'fhan mé sa bhaile an lá ar fad
result.orig: d'fhan mé sa bhaile an lá ar fad
result.html: d'fhan mé sa bhaile an lá ar fadI stayed home the whole day.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan mé sa ḃaile an lá ar fadI stayed home the whole day.

result.eng: He stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ga: d'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.orig: d'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.html: d'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteachHe stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan sé tamall ag breaṫnú ar an seanteaċHe stayed a while looking at the old house.

result.eng: He stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ga: d'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.orig: d'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.html: d'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan sé ón ól b'in é an príoṁrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.

result.eng: We stayed in a self-catering house.
result.html: d'fhan muid i dteach féinfhreastailWe stayed in a self-catering house.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟan muid i dteaċ féinḟreastailWe stayed in a self-catering house.

result.eng: The Mandelbrot family stayed there during the war, living in Tulle, a small town in the middle of the country.
result.ga: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
result.orig: d'fhan muintir mandelbrot ann le linn an chogaidh agus cónaí orthu i tulle baile beag i lár na tíre
